values: 折叠（纸张、衣物等）；包；裹；包围；拥抱；闭合；叠平；倒闭；将（动物）赶入围栏；缩减（业务）；折入（食材）
折痕；褶；折叠处；折叠部分；皮肤的皱纹；畜栏；信徒群体；褶层；地层褶曲；（地壳岩石层的）褶皱；地面的起伏

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 文件夹；折叠机；折叠式印刷品

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指使某物起折痕或把某物弄皱。

word_group.brief_definition: (把…)折叠起来；(因痛苦)不能支撑, 倒塌
双手合拢；十指交叉地双手相握

bilingual.source: SpaceShipTwo will ‘feather', or fold up, its wings.
bilingual.target: 太空船二号将“羽化”或折叠其机翼。

bilingual.source: Can you help me fold these towels?
bilingual.target: 你能帮我折叠这些毛巾吗？

bilingual.source: He showed me how to fold a paper crane.
Cardboard is easy to cut and fold.
bilingual.target: 硬纸板很容易被切割和折叠。

bilingual.source: She likes to fold her clothes neatly.
bilingual.target: 她喜欢把衣服整齐地折叠。

bilingual.source: Please fold this piece of paper in half.
bilingual.target: 请把这张纸折叠成两半。

bilingual.source: Fold the paper in half to make a card.
bilingual.target: 把纸折叠成两半做成一张卡片。

bilingual.source: Fold the blanket and put it on the shelf.
bilingual.target: 把毯子折叠起来放在架子上。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't you have some folding to do? Go fold dear. Fold. You fold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不是要叠衣服吗？快去吧，去叠呀。

yingyinNormal.en: Fold the paper down the middle. Now fold the corners in at one end. Fold both corners in again to make a point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把纸像这样对折。再将一端的两个角折起来。接着再折一下，做成一个尖尖的角。

yingyinNormal.en: Fold the paper down the middle. Now fold the corners in at one end. Fold both corners in again to make a point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把纸像这样对折。再将一端的两个角折起来。接着再折一下，做成一个尖尖的角。

yingyinNormal.en: What if we don't fold our clothes at all? I'd... or what if we fold them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们不叠衣服呢？我...或者如果我们叠起来呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Bit of stretch, fold it over and over again. Knuckles in, fold over the top and then in, in, in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 向外推一点，然后再卷进来用指关节压几下，再把一头卷进来接着卷。

yingyinNormal.en: You flatten out your loaf to a rough rectangle, fold over the top, and fold it up, all the way and flatten that down again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把面包做成长条状，把头往里卷再卷，就这样，然后再摊平。

yingyinNormal.en: Fold over the ends. Into the tin, knuckles in, flatten it down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把两边卷进去，放到盒子里，挤一下，压平整。

yingyinNormal.en: Then fold the sides back like this. Paper aeroplanes. Let's see if they can fly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后把两边像这样折起来。是纸做的飞机。让我们来看看他们能不能飞。

yingyinNormal.en: Then fold the sides back like this. Paper aeroplanes. Let's see if they can fly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后把两边像这样折起来。是纸做的飞机。让我们来看看他们能不能飞。

yingyinNormal.en: So now, what exactly is the point of the box? Chandler? The meaning of the box is three fold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 关箱子的用意到底何在？钱德。有三重意义。

yingyinNormal.en: She gets tons of catalogs and, she'll fold down the pages of the things she thinks that I'd like.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她有一大堆目录，她会把我会喜欢的部分折起来。

yingyinNormal.en: So just stretch, tuck it over, stretch, fold it over, and that is the very very basics of kneading.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就这样向外推，再卷进来，推出去，卷进来，这是最基本的揉面。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, well, I stood in the back, and I watched you show the workers how to fold and box the clothes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，恩，我站在你身后，看着你教那些工人如果折衣服再包装它们

yingyinNormal.en: Now I'm gonna dig this out, put it in a little bit of flour, flatten it down with your hand, fold it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来就是把面团取出来，放一些面粉，用手压平，再卷起来。

yingyinNormal.en: After washing your hands, shake them hard 12 times, then fold the piece of paper in half and wipe like so.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洗完手后，甩手12下然后把纸巾对折然后擦干手。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the optimal arrangement to dry with the least amount of paper. Again, shake your hands 12 times, fold, and dry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是用最少量的纸，达到最佳的干手方式 再看一次，甩手12下，对折再擦干。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, today's episode of Fun with Flags is not fun, but it is important. Flags: you gotta know how to hold them, you gotta know how to fold them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天《有趣的旗帜》的内容并不有趣但十分重要，旗帜第一课要学会如何拿，如何叠。

yingyinNormal.en: That's a risk I'm willing to take. All right, then. Let's go to the bedroom, remove our clothes, fold them neatly and engage in frenzied lovemaking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我愿意冒这个险。那好吧。我们进卧室，除去衣衫，叠得整整齐齐再开始狂野性爱。

yingyinNormal.en: When I was a little piggy, I used to fold newspaper like this. What is Daddy Pig doing? To make a paper boat. Daddy Pig has made a paper boat. Thank you, Mr. Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我记得在我小时候，我经常会用报纸做手工 就像这样。猪爸爸要做什么？我要做一艘船。猪爸爸用报纸做了一艘纸船。谢谢你，猪爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: Boy, you know, when Sheldon sees you in that dress, he's gonna want to methodically take it off, fold it up, carefully place it in a storage box, label it, and then ravish you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，谢尔顿看到你穿这条裙子后，一定会想井然有序地把裙子脱掉，折好，小心放入储物盒，贴好标签，然后尽情蹂躏你。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: College students who dreamed about a computer maze (迷宫) task showed a 10-<highlight>fold</highlight> improvement in their ability to find their way through the maze.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 梦见过电脑迷宫任务的大学生们在寻找迷宫路径的能力上提高了10倍。

direction_info.description:

examination_example.sentence: These pieces can be <highlight>folded</highlight> into a neat little pack and fastened on your belt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些碎片可以折叠成一个整洁的小包装，系在腰带上。

direction_info.description:

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (把…)折叠起来；(因痛苦)不能支撑；倒塌

examination_example.sentence: As the cloth is <highlight>folded</highlight>, some parts become dark blue, while other parts have a lighter color.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当布料折叠时，有些部分会变成深蓝色，而另一些部分会变成浅色。

examination_example.sentence: It can be <highlight>folded</highlight>, so it can be put into a small bag.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以折叠，这样就可以放进一个小袋子里。

examination_example.sentence: The paper, usually red, is <highlight>folded</highlight> before it is cut with scissors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种纸通常是红色的，在用剪刀剪之前先折叠好。
